title: Batik Process, "Balai Penelitian Batik and Kerajinan", 1970s
medium:
Medium: cotton, paper, wax
Technique: wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave
description: Nine samples of cotton mounted on a two-fold yellow card showing the steps in making batik. Each of the nine steps is briefly described.

tombstone.epitaph:
Batik Process, "Balai Penelitian Batik and Kerajinan", 1970s.Medium: cotton, paper, wax
